name: Show your metal
description:
In this game you are a robot that cannot move,
However you have the power of magnets!

Move objects in the environment to move forward trough the levels

Feedback form:
Please fill out this form to give feedback

**Volume warning game sound is pretty loud!**

Controls 
Q and E :  Cycle objects
W,A,S and D: move object (if one is selected)
R: reset level

There is only one level you fool (The next level button does nothing)
